[i]Opulence[/i] – As long as you have the highest life total or are tied for the highest life total, Warad is a 7/7 Demon and has flying and “{WB}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.”

Trample
Whenever Anzu deals combat damage to a player, exile that many cards from your graveyard with a devour counter on them. You may cast a copy of spells exiled this way by removing a devour counter from them.
Whenever a card leaves your graveyard, surveil 1.

Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, put a loyalty counter on Urukh.
[0]: Target player mills two cards. Draw a card.
[-2]: The next spell you cast from your hand this turn has delve.
[-7]: Create a 7/7 black Nightmare creature token with menace and ward–mill seven cards. Target player draws seven cards.

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Durg's power is equal to the total number of counters among permanents you control and players.
Whenever Durg, Enclave's Warden enters or attacks, put a ward {1} counter on target permanent.

Whenever Baal enters or attacks, it connives.
Whenever you discard a card, if its mana value is less than Baal's power, you may exile it and create a Treasure token. You may play that card until the end of turn.

Spirited [i](When this enters, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its cost.)[/i]
{2}{W}{U}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Until end of turn, if a creature entering causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

At the beginning of your upkeep, Zaeyr becomes a copy of up to one target nonland permanent until end of turn except it has “Spells you cast that share a card type with this permanent cost {1} less to cast.”
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Flying, protection from black and red
When you cast Mergho, aetherize any number of other permanents you control. [i](To aetherize, create a token that's a copy of it, then exile that token.)[/i]

Whenever Saasa attacks, create a 1/1 black Bird enchantment creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking, for each enchantment you control.
Whenever an enchantment you control enters, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

[+1]: Until end of turn, Corvu becomes a 1/2 Bird Avatar creature with flying, haste, and indestructible. It connives.
[-3]: Destroy target creature. Its controller gets two frenzy counters. [i](Frenzy counters reduce a player's maximum hand size. Pay {2} as a sorcery to remove a frenzy counter.)[/i]
[-8]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a player discards a card, this emblem deals 1 damage to each opponent.”

cards.rules_text:
Mother of Beasts has the abilities of other Beasts you control and other creatures you control with power 4 or greater.
At the beginning of your first upkeep, if Mother of Beasts is in your command zone and you're not the starting player, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, create an Oasis token.

Vigilance, haste
Cuith gets +1/+0 for each other tapped creature you control.
{T}: Create Cuith's Blade, a 3/1 colorless artifact creature token with flying and first strike. Tap it and put two stun counters on it.

Reincarnate [i](When this creature dies, if it isn't a token, create a token copy of it with flying except it's a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types.)[/i]
When Dir enters or dies, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying. Then you draw a card and create an Idol token for each differently named token you control.

Lifelink
When Idad enters, convocate. [i](Create a 1/1 colorless Cleric creature token, or create a token copy of a token you control.)[/i]
Tokens you control have “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.”

Ussuh enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
If Ussuh's power is 3 or greater, it has reach and “You may play two additional lands each turn.” If it's 6 or greater, it has ward {2} and “{4}: Draw a card.” If it's 9 or greater, it has trample and “Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, untap all lands you control.”

Vigilance
Creatures you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by tokens or creatures with defender.
Partner

Wither [i](This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)[/i]
Whenever Transcendent Agnar attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, it deals damage equal to that card's mana value to target creature.
Partner

Inspirit [i](Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {UR}. If you do, discard a card then draw a card.)[/i]
Whenever a player draws their second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Sola.
Partner

Trample
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, put those counters on Libluth.
Partner

Lifelink
Sacrifice another creature: Create an Elixir token. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](It's an enchantment with “{1}, Sacrifice this: If you gained 4 or more life this turn, draw a card. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.”)[/i]
Partner

Enlist [i](As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.)[/i]
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, you may aetherize target tapped creature.
Partner

Evoke–Sacrifice a land. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]
When Cit enters, draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
Partner

Flying
Other creatures you control have virulent 1. [i](Whenever it deals damage to a creature, that creature's controller gets a poison counter.)[/i]
Partner

First strike
Whenever Aloro deals combat damage to a player, the next nonland permanent spell you cast this turn gains spirited. [i](When it enters, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its cost.)[/i]
Partner

Deathtouch
Whenever a permanent becomes untapped or destroyed, that permanent's controller mills a card.
Partner
{1}, Sacrifice this: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
{1}, Sacrifice this: If you gained 4 or more life this turn, draw a card. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.
{T}, Sacrifice this: Add one mana of any color.

Whenever this attacks, proliferate twice.
You may play land cards from your graveyard.
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, this deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Flying, first strike
{T}, Sacrifice this: Add one mana of any color.

This is all colors.
Whenever this attacks while saddled, it explores.

Menace
Ward–Mill seven cards.

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your first main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

Lands you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

When Solemn Simulacrum enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When this creature dies, you may draw a card.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Elixir of Perpetuity: If you gained 4 or more life this turn, draw a card. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.
When Elixir of Perpetuity is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, shuffle it and any number of cards from your graveyard into your library.

Escape–Exile two other cards from your graveyard.
You have no maximum hand size.
{2}, Sacrifice Inscrutable Talisman: Draw a card.

Sunset Pyramid enters with three brick counters on it.
{2}, {T}: Scry 1.
{2}, {T}, Remove a brick counter from Sunset Pyramid: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Cosmic Chart: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Choose one –
• Add one mana of any color.
• Target player loses 2 life.
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Target player mills four cards.

Runic Pillars enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
{2}: Add one mana of any color.

When Chamber of Reflections enters, draw a card, then choose a legendary card name.
Permanents you control with the chosen name have hexproof and the “legend rule” doesn't apply to them.

If you control a Plains and an Island, Skybright Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

If you control a Mountain and a Forest, Newleaf Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

If you control a Swamp and an Mountain, Helltide Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

If you control an Island and a Swamp, Gravemurk Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

If you control a Swamp and a Forest, Shadowbog Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

If you control a Mountain and a Plains, Cliffhome Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

If you control a Forest and an Island, Lilypond Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

If you control a Forest and a Plains, Woodbellow Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

If you control a Plains and a Swamp, Dusklight Obelisk costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
As the game begins, choose a creature type.
The adorned commander has changeling and “Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.”
You may include creature cards of the chosen type in your deck regardless of color identity.

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
The adorned commander is legendary.

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
The adorned commander costs {2} more to cast and has partner.

[i](Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)[/i]
Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
The adorned commander enters with an additional +1/+1 counter or loyalty counter and its commander tax is reduced by {2}.
The adorned commander must be monocolored and loses partner.

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
As the game begins, choose a color. The adorned commander is the chosen color.
You may only include up to five cards of the chosen color in your deck.

[i](Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)[/i]
You are the starting player.

[i](Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)[/i]
Your minimum deck size is reduced by nine and your maximum deck size is increased by nine.

Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
[i]Lieutenant[/i] – {5}: Unlock Royal Bank. If you control your commander, put the revealed card in your hand. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
{0}: If you control four or more Study permanents, unlock Hall of Scholars and put the revealed card in your hand.

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
The adorned commander is white.

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
The adorned commander is blue.

The adorned commander is black.

The adorned commander is red.

Regalia [i](Start the game with this face up in the command zone and adorn an unadorned commander.)[/i]
The adorned commander is green.

Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}: Unlock Colossal Gate. If the revealed card is red, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}: Unlock Bygone Gate. If the revealed card is green, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
{W}{W}{W}{W}{W}: Unlock Enigmatic Gate. If the revealed card is white, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
{B}{B}{B}{B}{B}: Unlock Desolate Gate. If the revealed card is black, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

Puzzlebox [i](Begin the game with this and another card you own from outside the game in the command zone, locked. That card is face down until you unlock this.)[/i]
{U}{U}{U}{U}{U}: Unlock Ineffable Gate. If the revealed card is blue, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

Changeling
When Ethereal Vagabond enters or dies, you may exile it and return it to the battlefield transformed.

{4}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of colors.

cards.rules_text:
Golden age [i](If you cast an instant or sorcery spell, activated a nonmana ability, and attacked this turn, enter a renaissance for this game.)[/i]
{3}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Familiar: Choose two different basic land types. For each, create a tapped colorless land token of that type. If you're in a renaissance, this ability costs {3} less to activate.

When Scout's Compass enters, create a Mount token. [i](It's a 1/1 Mount creature token that's all colors with saddle 1 and “Whenever this attacks while saddled, it explores.”)[/i]
{3}, {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with flying.
{6}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Nightmare creature token with menace.
cards.rules_text2: Copy target activated or triggered ability. [i](Cast a copy once each turn you tapped this artifact.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a sphere counter on Assembling Spheres.
{2}, Remove three sphere counters from Assembling Spheres: Create a 0/0 colorless Golem creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.”

Convoke [i](Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)[/i]
When Answer to Prayers enters, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Surveil 1.
[i]Kinship[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with your commander, you may reveal it. If you do, put it in your hand. If you control five or more creatures of that type, you may cast it without paying its mana cost instead.

[i]Imprint[/i] – When Forgotten Volume enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add {C}. If a card is exiled with Forgotten Volume, add {G} instead.
{2}, {T}: If the exiled card is green, put it in your hand. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

[i]Imprint[/i] – When Robust Manuscript enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add {C}. If a card is exiled with Robust Manuscript, add {W} instead.
{2}, {T}: If the exiled card is white, put it in your hand. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

[i]Imprint[/i] – When Enchanted Scroll enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add {C}. If a card is exiled with Enchanted Scroll, add {U} instead.
{2}, {T}: If the exiled card is blue, put it in your hand. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

[i]Imprint[/i] – When Malefic Grimoire enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add {C}. If a card is exiled with Malefic Grimoire, add {B} instead.
{2}, {T}: If the exiled card is black, put it in your hand. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

[i]Imprint[/i] – When Alchemical Journal enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.
{T}: Add {C}. If a card is exiled with Alchemical Journal, add {R} instead.
{2}, {T}: If the exiled card is red, put it in your hand. Otherwise, put it on top of your library.

Archive 5
When Hesah's Study enters, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token and put two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, proliferate.

Archive 4
You may play creature cards with power or toughness 4 or greater from the archived library.
When Zagal's Study is sacrificed, create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

Archive 7 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top seven cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
{BR}, Pay 2 life, Discard a card: Draw a card from each of your libraries.

Archive 5
Inspirit
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, if it's the second card you've drawn this turn, it costs {2} less to cast this turn.

Archive 6
Whenever you put one or more cards from the archived library into your graveyard, put that many cards from the top of your main library on the bottom of the archived library.

Archive 6
When Idad's Study enters, convocate. [i](Create a 1/1 colorless Cleric creature token, or create a token copy of a token you control.)[/i]
Sacrifice X tokens: Put a permanent card with mana value X or less from the archived library onto the battlefield. X can't be 0.

Archive 5
Whenever a permanent card is put into your hand from the battlefield, you may aetherize it. If you do, exchange it with a card from the archived library.

Archive 5
Tap an untapped creature you control: Exile the top card of the archived library. You may play it as long as you control Nin's Study.

Archive 5
Whenever a land you control enters for the first time each turn, you may put a land card from the archived library onto the battlefield tapped.

Archive X
Whenever you draw a card from the archived library, target opponent loses life equal to its mana value and you gain that much life.

Archive 5
Spells you cast that share a card type with the top card of the archived library cost {1} less to cast.
{2}{U}: Surveil 1, then you may draw a card from the archived library.

Archive 7
When Ishim's Study enters, it deals 3 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, you may discard a card and draw a card from the archived library.

Archive 0
When Anuun's Study enters, search your main library for up to four land cards, shuffle them into the archived library, then shuffle your main library.

Archive 7
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell or a nonbasic land enters under their control, draw a card from the archived library unless that player pays {1}.

Archive 5 [i](As this enters, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and draw a card from the archived library.
